silver.name: AFK
silver.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

silver.name: Team Building
silver.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.

silver.name: Caretaker's Ally
silver.desc: Each time you level up, gain the same random Tier 2 champion.

silver.name: Blood Money
silver.desc: Gain 3 gold per 10 Health your Tactician loses.

silver.name: Sliver Ticket
silver.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls.

silver.name: Buried Treasures I
silver.desc: At the start of the next 2 rounds, gain a random item component.

silver.name: Partial Ascension
silver.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

silver.name: Rolling For Days I
silver.desc: Gain 9 free Shop rerolls that never expire.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc: Gain a random component. Whenever you would get a random component, instead gain a component anvil.

silver.name: Cutting Corners
silver.desc: Leveling up costs 3 XP less.

silver.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 health.

silver.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

silver.name: Parting Gifts
silver.desc: When a champion dies, the nearest ally with open slots receieves a temporary copy of an item they were holding and a 10% max Health Shield.

silver.name: Spoils of War I
silver.desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

silver.name: Unified Resistance I
silver.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Harmacist I
silver.desc:
Your team has 10% Omnivamp and convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

silver.name: Healing Orbs I
silver.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 225.

silver.name: Indomitable Will
silver.desc: When your units score a Takedown they shed all negative effects and become immune to Crowd Control for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 4 Gold.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Late game Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil after 8 player combats.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each Tier One champion.

silver.name: On a Roll
silver.desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain up to 3 free Shop rerolls per round. Gain 3 gold.

silver.name: One, Two, Five!
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 Gold, and 1 random Tier 5 champion.

silver.name: One Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 3 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain a random component.

silver.name: Pumping Up I
silver.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Blistering Strikes
silver.desc: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

silver.name: Risky Moves
silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 30 Gold.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Stationary Support I
silver.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) equipped with 1 random Support item(s), which cannot be removed.

silver.name: Teaming Up I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

silver.name: Tiny Titans
silver.desc: Increase your current and maximum player health by 30.

silver.name: Young and Wild and Free
silver.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 3 Gold.

silver.name: Keepers I
silver.desc: Combat start: units with adjacent allies gain a 150 Health shield for 8 seconds. This shield stacks.

silver.name: Vampirism I
silver.desc:
Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 2 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

silver.name: Silver Veil
silver.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

silver.name: Reach The Summit
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 10 gold and 50.

silver.name: Help Is On The Way
silver.desc: After 8 player combats. choose 1 of 4 Support items.

silver.name: Good For Something I
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 35% to drop 1 gold on death.

silver.name: Switching Gears
silver.desc: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

silver.name: Sticks And Stones
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.

silver.name: Stimpack
silver.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

silver.name: Best Friends I
silver.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 12% Attack Speed and 10 Armor at the start of combat.

gold.name: A Cut Above
gold.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

gold.name: Balanced Budget II
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 7 Gold.

gold.name: Caretaker's Favor
gold.desc: Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

gold.name: Big Grab Bag
gold.desc: Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and a Reforger.

gold.name: Buried Treasures II
gold.desc: At the start of the next 3 rounds, gain a random item component.

gold.name: Capricious Forge
gold.desc: Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two temporary Artifacts each round.

gold.name: Clear Mind
gold.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points.

gold.name: Cluttered Mind
gold.desc: If your bench is full at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points. Gain 4 random Tier 1 champions.

gold.name: Combat Caster
gold.desc: Your team gains a 90-170 Health shield for 6 seconds after casting their Ability. The shield amount scales with round of the game.

gold.name: Ascension
gold.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

gold.name: Contagion
gold.desc: Combat Start: Infect the highest health enemy, increasing their damage taken by 18%. Every 5 seconds and on death, the infection spreads to 2 nearby units.

gold.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

gold.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

gold.name: Spoils of War II
gold.desc: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

gold.name: Mana Burn
gold.desc: All enemies take 1% of their max Health as true damage each second until they cast their Ability. Gain a Shroud of Stillness.

gold.name: Escort Quest
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Each round, if it survives combat, gain 3 gold.

gold.name: Unified Resistance II
gold.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

gold.name: Gargantuan Resolve
gold.desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.

gold.name: Gift from the fallen
gold.desc: Your units gain 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist. When one of your units dies, all your units gain these stats again.

gold.name: Harmacist II
gold.desc:
Your team has 15% Omnivamp and convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

gold.name: Healing Orbs II
gold.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 450.

gold.name: Idealism
gold.desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding this item deal 12% increased damage.

gold.name: Scrappy Inventions
gold.desc: Combat start: Up to 5 equipped components turn into completed items for the rest of combat. Gain a component at the start of the next 2 stages.

gold.name: Infusion
gold.desc: Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus II
gold.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 15% Critical Strike chance.

gold.name: Frequent Flier
gold.desc: After you reroll your shop 8 times, reroll only cost 1 gold.

gold.name: Know Your Enemy
gold.desc: Your team deals 10% more damage. Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

gold.name: Last Stand
gold.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 160 Health, 16 Armor and Magic Resist, and 16% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Patient Study
gold.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

gold.name: Long Distance Pals II
gold.desc: Combat start: Your two furthest champions form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

gold.name: Martyr
gold.desc: Whenever one of your units dies, all allies heal for 9% of Maximum health

gold.name: Metabolic Accelerator
gold.desc: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

gold.name: Not Today
gold.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Magic Wand
gold.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18% Ability Power.

gold.name: Pandora's Items II
gold.desc:
Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 1 random completed item.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 2 Artifacts.

gold.name: Portable Forge+
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 3 Artifacts.

gold.name: Portable Forge++
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

gold.name: Pumping Up II
gold.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

gold.name: Return on Investment
gold.desc: When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer
gold.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Salvage Bin+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Golden Ticket
gold.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.

gold.name: Sleight of Hand
gold.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Stars are Born
gold.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 5 gold.

gold.name: Stationary Support II
gold.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

gold.name: Support Cache
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

gold.name: Teaming Up II
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

gold.name: Three's a Crowd
gold.desc: Your team gains 75 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Three's Company
gold.desc: Gain 4 random 3-cost champions.

gold.name: Tons of Stats!
gold.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 2 gold.

gold.name: Two Healthy
gold.desc: Your team gains 110 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: What Doesn't Kill You
gold.desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

gold.name: You Have My Bow
gold.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

gold.name: You Have My Sword
gold.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

gold.name: Remember Your Roots
gold.desc: Allies sharing a trait with your Headliner gain 200 Health and 10% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Bigger Shot
gold.desc: Every 3 attacks, Big Shots also fires a bomb that deals 100% Attack Damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target. Gain a Kaisa.

gold.name: Best Friends II
gold.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.

gold.name: Insert Coin
gold.desc: Your 8-Bit champions execute targets below @ExecuteThreshold*100@% Health. Executions have a 10% chance to drop 1 gold, increased by 2% for each high score achieved. Gain a Corki and a Garen.

gold.name: Encore!
gold.desc: The first time your Headliner dies, they become invulnerable and heal 60% of their max Health over 1.5 seconds instead.

gold.name: Metal Heads
gold.desc: Your Pentakill champions are immune to crowd control for the first 12 seconds of combat. They heal 4% of their max Health on takedown. Gain a Kayle and a Gnar.

gold.name: Inspiring Epitaph
gold.desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 25% max Health shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.

gold.name: Live For Danger
gold.desc: Edgelords attacks deal 40% of their damage to enemies within 1 hexes of their target. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.

gold.name: Fully Adapted
gold.desc: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects.

gold.name: Twin Terror I
gold.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 300 Health, 30% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

gold.name: That's Jazz, Baby!
gold.desc:
Gain a Bard. Combat start: Jazz champions gain permanent bonuses based on the number of active traits. 3: 20 max Health
5: and 2% Attack Speed
7: and 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power

gold.name: Crash Test Dummies
gold.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1.25 seconds.

gold.name: Blank Slate
gold.desc: Immediately sell your team (including bench) for double their value. Your next 8 Shop rerolls are free only for this round.

gold.name: Heavy Hitters
gold.desc: Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1% of their max Health.

gold.name: Vampirism II
gold.desc:
Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

gold.name: Learning To Spell
gold.desc: Your team gains 10 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.

gold.name: Double The Funk
gold.desc: Your Disco Balls affect allies up to 2 hexes away and pulse every 2.5 seconds. Gain a Nami and a Gragas.

gold.name: Expose Weakness
gold.desc: Damage from Executioners' attacks and spells Shred and Sunder enemies by 30% for 3 seconds. Gain a Twitch.

gold.name: Scape goat
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 2 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

gold.name: Shock Treatment
gold.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Stikk Shivs' chain lightning effect deals 40~125% more damage.

gold.name: Heroic Presence
gold.desc: Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Pantheon.

gold.name: The Ol' Razzle Dazzle
gold.desc: The damage over time effect from your Dazzlers lasts 2 seconds longer and deals 100% more damage. Gain a Nami and a Bard.

gold.name: Big Gains
gold.desc: Your team gains 80 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.

gold.name: Good For Something II
gold.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.

gold.name: Little Buddies
gold.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 75 and 9% Attack Speed for each 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your field.

gold.name: Crown Guarded
gold.desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 75% stronger.

gold.name: Too Big To Fail
gold.desc: On death, Bruisers deal 35% of their max Health to enemies within 1 hex. After 15 seconds, expand the range to 2 hexes. Gain an Olaf and a Gragas.

gold.name: Raise the Tempo
gold.desc: When your Spellweavers cast their 2nd Ability each combat, they instantly cast it again at 50% effectiveness. Gain a Gragas and a Seraphine.

gold.name: Low Interest Rates
gold.desc: Your max interest is capped at 3 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

gold.name: Bounty Hunters
gold.desc: Country champions have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill. Your Dreadsteed's chances are doubled. Gain a Samira.

gold.name: Lucky Streak
gold.desc: Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

gold.name: Ramping Rhythm
gold.desc: Rapidfire champions can gain Attack Speed from their trait up to 30 stacks. (Now starts Rapidfire champs at 4 stacks immediately) Gain a Jinx and a Senna.

gold.name: Submit To The Pit
gold.desc: For each adjacent ally, Moshers gain 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, and 4% Attack Speed. Gain a Jax and a Gnar.

gold.name: Emotional Connection
gold.desc: Allies of your Emo champions gain 60% of the Emo Mana bonus when any ally dies. Gain an Annie and a Vex.

gold.name: Blinged Out
gold.desc: Your True Damage champions gain 80 Health and 8% Attack Speed for each item they are holding. Gain a Yasuo and a Senna.

gold.name: Keepers II
gold.desc: Combat start: units with adjacent allies gain a 220 Health shield for 8 seconds. This shield stacks.

gold.name: Do It for the Fans
gold.desc: Your Headliner's damage heals your Superfans for 22% of the damage dealt. Gain a Gnar.

gold.name: Heroic grab bag
gold.desc: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 4 gold.

gold.name: Balanced Budget II+
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 9 Gold.

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component Anvil
Level 6: Completed Item Anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items.

prismatic.name: Binary Airdrop
prismatic.desc: Combat start: champions holding 2 items gain a random 3rd completed item. Gain a 2 Gold.

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

prismatic.name: Blinding Speed
prismatic.desc: Gain a Red Buff and a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve bow, a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures III
prismatic.desc: At the start of the next 6 rounds, gain a random item component.

prismatic.name: Final Ascension
prismatic.desc: Your team deals 15 more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.

prismatic.name: Cursed Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain +2 max team size, but take 100% more player damage when you lose a player combat.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.

prismatic.name: Final Reserves
prismatic.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 70 XP and set your gold to 50. Excess gold is converted to XP.

prismatic.name: Prisimatic Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

prismatic.name: Jeweled Lotus III
prismatic.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 40% Critical Strike chance.

prismatic.name: Harmacist III
prismatic.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage they deal, and they convert 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc: Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund+
prismatic.desc: Gain 30 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund++
prismatic.desc: Gain 40 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Shopping Spree
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.

prismatic.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Infernal Contract
prismatic.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 90 Gold.

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves+
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.

prismatic.name: Wellness Trust
prismatic.desc: Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, heal 2 player Health.

prismatic.name: New Recruit
prismatic.desc: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes+
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Overwhelming Force
prismatic.desc: Gain a Deathblade and an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Items III
prismatic.desc:
Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain a random Radiant item.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday+
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Roll The Dice
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

prismatic.name: Cruel Pact
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat.

prismatic.name: March of Progress
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

prismatic.name: Starter Kit
prismatic.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion and a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again. Gain 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Stationary Support III
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan+
prismatic.desc:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

prismatic.name: Unleashed Arcana
prismatic.desc: Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: What The Forge
prismatic.desc: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.

prismatic.name: Talent Search
prismatic.desc: All of your champions gain their unique Headliner effect. In Addition, your Headliner gains 100 Health and 10% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Determined investors
prismatic.desc:
The first time you have 40 gold at the end of combat, gain Diamond Hands and 2 item component(s).

This defensive item helps you gain more gold.

prismatic.name: Twin Terror II
prismatic.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 450 Health, 45% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

prismatic.name: Going Long
prismatic.desc:
Gain 8 gold. You no longer gain interest. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Hologram
prismatic.desc: Create a clone of your Headliner champion with 100%-130% of its base health (based on stage level). You cannot equip items on the clone.
